captions.text: Hello.

Another hairdo we're
going to do this morning

is called the
twistback flip under.

So this is kind of like
combining two hairdo we've

done in the past into one, but
it's fun, quick, easy, simple.

And of course,
that's what we're all

looking for on
school mornings when

we're trying to get all
the kids out the door.

So if you just start by
parting their hair wherever

their natural part line is--
for her, it's on the left.
See, I've already got it parted.

Then I'm just going
to kind of part

down from that to her ear and
section off that little piece.

Now I like her hair
a little bit wet just
to help the flyaways stay in.
I'm going to twist it back.
Excuse me.

When I get it twisted, I'm going
to have her hold this for me

while I gather the rest of
her hair into a side ponytail.
So just comb into a side pony.

And when you've got the side
ponytail the way you want it,

then add that little twist in
and rubber band them together.

When that's done, pull it away
from the head a little bit
to loosen it.

And then using your
amazing topsy tail,

pull the whole
pony tail through.
And there you go.

Have a fun little side twist
into a little flip under.

title: Twistback Flip Under | Cute Girls Hairstyles
